name: EgoBoost
0:
”Alexa, tell Ego Boost to boost my ego”
”Alexa, ask Ego Boost to give me a compliment”
”Alexa, tell Ego Boost to gas me up”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ego boost
des: Do you ever need a quick pick-me-up? Enable Ego Boost and receive a compliment any time you want. All you have to do is ask Alexa and she'll respond with candid praise.
